actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Battleaxes or three Arcane Bolts.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 13 (2d8+4) slashing damage or 15 (2d10+4) slashing damage if used with two hands + 4 (1d8) force.

actions.name: Arcane Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 12 (2d8+3) force.

actions.name: Curse Item (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Curses one magic item it can see within 60' of it. If item is being worn or carried by a creature creature must make DC 15 Cha save to avoid curse. For 1 min cursed item suffers one curse described below based on type.

special_abilities.name: Arcane Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Its weapon attacks are magical. When it hits with any weapon deals an extra 1d8 force (included below).

special_abilities.name: Artisan's Prowess
special_abilities.desc: If a magic item requires an action to activate ogre can activate it as a bonus action instead.

special_abilities.name: Sense Magic
special_abilities.desc: Senses magic within 120' of it at will. Otherwise works like the detect magic spell but isn't itself magical.
